format: a mix of shell scripting (BitBake recipes) and some Python snippets
description: This file is a BitBake recipe fragment (.inc), used for building the Linux kernel within the Yocto Project build system. It includes metadata, dependencies, conditional logic, and build instructions relevant to kernel compilation.

methods.name: do_devshell:prepend()
methods.description: Sets environment variables for package configuration paths, prepping environment for developer shell access.
